sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ rènwéi tā shuō de duì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je pense qu'il a raison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I think he is right.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shēngyīn tiáo dà yīdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez augmenter le volume.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn up the volume.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你的汉语水平提高了很多。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ de Hànyǔ shuǐpíng tígāo le hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ton niveau de chinois s'est beaucoup amélioré.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Your Chinese level has improved a lot.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我想提高我的英语口语。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng tígāo wǒ de Yīngyǔ kǒuyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux améliorer mon anglais oral.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to improve my spoken English.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 体育锻炼对健康很重要。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tǐyù duànliàn duì jiànkāng hěn zhòngyào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'exercice physique est très important pour la santé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Physical exercise is very important for health.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tàiyáng chūlái le, tiānqì hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil est sorti, il fait beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun is out, the weather is nice.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de tuǐ zǒu lèi le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mes jambes sont fatiguées d'avoir marché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My legs are tired from walking.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yào qù xǐzǎo le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais prendre une douche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm going to take a shower.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你为什么不来参加聚会？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ wèishénme bù lái cānjiā jùhuì?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pourquoi ne viens-tu pas à la fête ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Why don't you come to the party?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我已经习惯了这里的生活。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng xíguàn le zhèlǐ de shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me suis déjà habitué à la vie ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have already gotten used to life here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàozhǎng zài kāimùshì shàng fāyán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le directeur a pris la parole lors de la cérémonie d'ouverture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The principal gave a speech at the opening ceremony.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guò mǎlù yào xiǎoxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Fais attention en traversant la rue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Be careful when crossing the street.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ kàn jīntiān de xīnwén le ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: As-tu regardé les nouvelles d'aujourd'hui ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Did you watch today's news?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǐwéi nǐ bù lái le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je pensais que tu ne viendrais pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I thought you weren't coming.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǐhòu wǒmen bǎochí liánxì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Restons en contact à l'avenir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's keep in touch in the future.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yībān lái shuō, tā hěn zhǔnshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En général, il est très ponctuel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Generally speaking, he is very punctual.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yínháng jǐ diǎn kāimén?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À quelle heure la banque ouvre-t-elle ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What time does the bank open?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yīnggāi duō xiūxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu devrais te reposer davantage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should rest more.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yòu chídào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est encore en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is late again.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yuànyì bāng wǒ yī gè máng ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Voudrais-tu me rendre un service ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Would you be willing to help me?
